Exaggerate: The claim exaggerates the announcement made by PM Modi by falsely stating that the lockdown has been increased till May 4.
Contradict fact: The claim contradicts the fact that PM Modi did not announce an extension of the lockdown till May 4.
Lack enough support: The claim lacks enough support as it is based on a morphed image with altered text.
Problematic assumption: The claim makes the problematic assumption that the viral screenshot is genuine and accurately represents PM Modi's announcement.
Exist alternative explanation: An alternative explanation is that the morphed image was created to spread misinformation and create panic.
